name: Jumping jack
description: A calisthenics exercise that involves jumping and moving arms and legs outward.

name: Jump rope
description: Skipping rope exercise that improves cardiovascular health and coordination.

name: Push up
description: An exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: High knee
description: A cardio exercise involving bringing knees up towards the chest alternately.

name: Burpees
description: A full-body exercise involving squatting, jumping, and a push-up.

name: Squats
description: A lower-body exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Jump squats
description: Squatting exercise with an explosive jump at the top, targeting legs and glutes.

name: Plank
description: An isometric exercise that engages the core muscles to maintain a position similar to a push-up.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A dynamic exercise that mimics climbing, engaging the core, arms, and legs from a planking position.

name: Butterfly Stretch
description: A stretch that opens up the hips and stretches the inner thighs, groin, and lower back.
target: Hips, Inner Thighs, Groin, Lower Back

name: Forward Fold
description: A standing stretch that targets the hamstrings and lower back, promoting flexibility.

name: Spinal Twist
description: A seated or lying stretch that releases tension in the spine and increases flexibility.

name: Lunge Stretch
description: A stretch that targets the hip flexors and quadriceps while improving balance and flexibility.

name: Child's Pose
description: A resting yoga pose that stretches the spine, hips, thighs, and ankles, promoting relaxation.

name: Russian Twists
description: In a sitting position, involving twisting motions from side to side, while holding a weight or without any equipment.

name: Leg Raises
description: Performed by lying flat on the back and raising both legs upwards.

name: Bicycle Crunches
description: An exercise involving rotational movements where the elbow meets the opposite knee while lying on the back.

name: Lunges
description: A unilateral lower-body exercise that involves stepping forward or backward and bending the knees.
